screens.name: Clone_Job
screens.label: Clone Job

fields.name: Property_Warning
fields.fieldText: Please use caution if selecting a different Property as this is a clone. Be sure to review the Branch, Protocols, and Billing info if you choose a different Property than the original Job.

fields.name: Account_Info_Display_Text
fields.fieldText: Account Name: {!GetAccount.Name}

fields.name: Job_Name_Issue
fields.fieldText: The Job Name will be the chosen Property Name (or Account Name if blank) with today's date appended. If you would instead like to enter a custom Job Name, please check the box:

fields.name: Tax_Exempt
fields.helpText: When check box is checked the customer is tax exempt for this job.

fields.name: Is_this_Job_a_Bid
fields.helpText: Check this box if the job was or will be involved in a bid process.

fields.name: GPO_DisplayText
fields.fieldText: This account has a GPO. If the job should have one, please select it.

fields.name: Lead_Source_Defining_Points_of_Contacts
fields.fieldText: Lead Source & Defining Points of Contacts

screens.pausedText: You have paused the flow

fields.name: Complete
fields.fieldText:
You successfully created the Job!


Click here to view your New Job

fields.name: Error_Message
fields.fieldText:
Please read the error below. Play close attention to the error after the phrase FIELD_CUSTOM_VALIDATION_EXCEPTION


{!$Flow.FaultMessage}


To fix the errors, click the previous button to go back into the field(s) that need attention. Then, click the Next button to complete the creation of the job.


Thank you!
